author: brampitoyo

comments.content: Nice classical look. I see some potential kerning problems, though. The tail of the _l_, for instance, while it looks good in isolation, demands too much room when set in a word. Also, the _g_ is a bit hard to recognize.

Good point about the _l_. I'll eliminate the tail and see what happens.

And the _g_, yeah, maybe I'll make it a single-storey, or reverse the direction of the hook.

I'll post the correction soon. Thanks for the feedback!

Any more critiques?
